AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Border Patrol: law enforcement agency involved in detecting illegal entry and smuggling, with agents having experience in evaluating circumstances related to reasonable suspicion
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Farm-to-Market Road 2050: road used by smugglers to circumvent checkpoints on Highway 59 and U.S. 359, with a recent surge in drop-offs where illegal aliens are picked up by vehicles heading north
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.black Dodge pickup truck: vehicle driven by IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR. and subject to a canine search, encountered by Agent Trevino within fifty miles of the United States-Mexico border
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.white Malibu sedan: vehicle stopped by Agent Trevino on Farm-to-Market Road 2050, transporting illegals, and traveling in tandem with the black Dodge pickup truck
